## Description
[e.g. I see dead people]

## Environment
-   OS: [e.g. macOS 10.14.5]
-   ChromaTerm: [e.g. 0.4.0 (`pip3 show chromaterm`)]

## Configuration File
If you know which highlight rule in `~/.chromaterm.yml` is causing the issue, put it here. If not, put the whole file in.

```
regex: hello world
color: f#123abc
```
